Package expr

Class Operation

java.lang.Object
expr.Expression
expr.Operation
public class Operation
extends Expression
Class used to store an operation. An operation is composed by two attribution and one operator. It also includes an id to find it on the OpTable.

  • Field Summary

    • Operation

      public Operation​(Attribution _operand1, Attribution _operand2, char _operator, Id _id)
      Constructor of the Operation class.
      Parameters:
      _operand1 - _operand1 is an Attribution object
      _operand2 - _operand2 is an Attribution object
      _operator - _operator is a char object. It can be '+' or '*'
      _id - _id is an Id object

    • getId

      public Id getId()
      Returns the Id object associated with this Operation. If you want to know the value you need to get the value (or name) of the Id. I.e: id.getName()
      Returns:
      Id id

    • setId

      public void setId​(Id id)

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Return the operation in a readable way. I.e: a + b
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      operand1 + " " + operator + " " + operand2
